name: Mice & Dungeons RPG
description:
This game was winner of the 100 Lines of Code GameMaker Jam.

A little simple RPG created with GameMaker in only 100 code lines.

FEATURES

  • RPG basic mechanics and combat
  • Turn based
  • 7 levels, 5 different enemies and 1 final boss
  • Title, intro and end screens
  • In just 100 lines of code

With source code and executable for windows.

Arrows - move
SPACE - attack (when red circle is showed)
